There is a sudden thud

movies.title: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil

jump_scares.spoiler: A snake suddenly gets hit by a stone
The doors burst open
A squirrel falls into the fireplace
Jump cut to some knocking
A ghost boy appears directly in front of the scope
The closet door behind the sniper slams shut
It is revealed to be a ghost woman standing at the desk
A nazi body falls and is hanged
The boy appears in the water and then a moment later behind the soldier
The ghost woman appears and screams
The woman appears behind the sniper
Louis moves swiftly to the light switch before returning to in front of Daniel
Lestat suddenly grabs Louis and bites him on the neck. [Video]
Louis answers the door but no-one is there, as he goes to close it a corpse-like Lestat suddenly grabs him around the neck. [Video]
As Claudia kisses Louis, a group of vampires suddenly burst onto the balcony
As Daniel protests that Louis hasn’t failed him, Louis swiftly moves to him and lifts him by the neck
Daniel listens to the tape in the car and says “good stuff” before Lestat’s hand reaches out to grab him
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
During the opening plane scene, immediately after a soldier vomits, heavy machine gun fire pierces the hull of the plane
After Boyce reaches dry land, he hears voices in the distance but is forced to duck when heavy gunfire rings out around him
Loud gunfire may startle some as one of the Americans is executed by Nazi soldiers
As the soldiers walk across a field on the way to the rendezvous point, a landmine explodes as one of the soldiers says “that way, you get a cut of the profits”
Boyce approaches a slightly ajar door to look at Chloe’s aunt. He hears a noise behind him and turns around, when he looks back a disfigured person is standing in front of the door
Chloe starts talking from behind Boyce
After the scientist and soldier leave, Boyce looks through the hole in the wall once more and this time a mutated person lunges towards the camera
As Boyce inspects the tar pit, something moves in the bag suspended above it
As Chase walks away from Wafner (who appears to be unconscious) saying “I think I’m gonna need…” he is suddenly tripped by Wafner
As Chloe talks to Paul in the tunnel, a mutated person reaches in and pulls her off screen
Ford turns around after setting the explosives and Wafner is standing directly in front of him
Wafner is suddenly shot after saying “I am a god, Corporal”
Mr. Darcy suddenly attacks Mr. Kingston
Annabelle turns around to reveal half her face is rotting
A zombie’s head is suddenly blown off
Jane kicks Elizabeth in the back
A zombie’s head is blown off
A man is suddenly pulled away from the door by a zombie
A zombie pulls Mr. Bingley off the staircase
A bat screeches and flies away
Colqhoun drops down in front of Reich
Reich suddenly grabs Boyd around the neck
Colqhoun falls through some wood and lands in front of Boyd
Ichabod reaches towards the sorceress when she suddenly leaps at him, revealing her horrific face. [Video]
A sudden loud noise as the scene changes to a classroom setting
A reflection in the window suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound effect
A hand grabs Florence as she reaches into the lake
A distorted child’s face comes into view through the peep hole
A face comes out of the pillow beside Florence
A child ghost jumps out at the groundskeeper as he hovers over the unconscious Florence
Larry looks inside a window and sees a white-eyed woman
A telephone rings
A hand reaches out through a dissolving hole in a wall, and attacks Joe
The camera zooms in on Martha, and immediately after the camera switches over on a decomposing corpse, floating on the surface in some water
The camera switches over to the white-eyed woman
As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her
Jill turns around and sees two corpses
Jill opens a door and runs into a one-eyed zombie
Jill opens her eyes and reveals that her eyes are now white
As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder
Martha discovers a re-animated Joe in the bathtub, that attacks her
The camera shifts over on a piano, that suddenly starts playing
Emily ducks her head down, and a zombie is standing behind her
A Zombie appears in front of the screen
Emily is crawling as the camera movers upwards to reveal another zombie
Dickie (the dog) turns around, and brutally kills Emily
Liza is suddenly attacked by the re-animated hotel worker
A unseen force suddenly hits Liza and John with thunderstorm, and blood starts dripping down on them
A zombie smashes through the window, and attacks Liza
The glass in a door suddenly breaks, and Dr. Harris is impaled by the glass splinter
A zombie leaps up, and attacks Liza
John opens a door, and sees a zombie slowly walking towards him and Liza
Jill suddenly attack Liza
Some scissors fall from a shelf while Carlos is filling his water jug
The ghost boy appears behind Carlos and touches him on the shoulder before disappearing
Carlos is surprised by his friends pulling the curtain beside his bed across while he is sleeping
Carlos looks out of a keyhole and an eye suddenly appears. [Video]
The girl walks away from the window and is suddenly pulled down to bed
The camera cuts to the child in the background to reveal its disfigured face
The child slowly approaches the girl and there is a sudden cut to him wildly flailing his head around
The old woman suddenly opens her eyes, and they are the eyes of a goat, not a human
As the girl walks around the house, a door shuts on its own
Something appears behind Heidi
Camera cuts to an old lady
A strange baby-like creature with extra extremities starts screeching

movies.title: The Last Voyage Of The Demeter

jump_scares.spoiler: The quick montage of the various shots of the ship ends with a sudden unrelated shot of Dracula lunging at the camera before the screen cuts to black
Culminating the long suspenseful scene, something suddenly moves inside the pile of dirt, startling Clemens who yelps and jumps back
Olgaren moves the spyglass and sees a closeup of Dracula’s face
Someone grabs Clemens by the shoulder from behind
Dracula moves and jumps at Petrofsky
The hatch of the cargo hold in the foreground of the shot is bumped from below
A flash of lightning reveals Dracula standing behind Larsen
Dracula jumps down at Larsen from the mast above him
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a closeup of Toby’s fingers opening the door with a loud sound
Olgaren bangs on the door after a drawn out moment of quiet tension
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a shot with loud voices and frantic movement happening in the foreground
Olgaren snarls and lunges at Clemens
Clemens, Captain Eliot and others see Dracula through the hole in the door
Dracula jumps down and grabs Toby
Abrams is hit in the head from behind
A cut to a closeup of Dracula’s snarling face
Toby’s eyes open, revealing milky white color
After several seconds of suspense, Dracula suddenly flies directly at the camera out of the mist
Captain Eliot turns around to see snarling Dracula right behind him
Accompanied by a loud orchestral chord, Winslow turns around to see Wake towering over him
Water breaks through the window accompanied by a discordant orchestral note
Winslow suddenly punches the clock
Wake suddenly runs at Winslow with an axe (this is accompanied by a loud orchestral beat)
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
There is a loud noise and some birds fly away
A man turns around and is suddenly attacked by a werewolf. [Video
There is a crack of a whip accompanied by a sudden scene change
A dog suddenly barks at Lawrence
Accompanied by a sound effect, Lawrence lifts the sheet to view his brothers decomposed corse
A man is tackled by a fast moving werewolf
A policeman’s outstretched hand is suddenly attacked by the werewolf
The werewolf jumps down onto Lawrence from atop a stone pillar
During a hallucination, the werewolf attacks Lawrence while he is in bed. [Video
Lawrence is startled as his father appears in front of him
A man shoots his gun and the muzzle flash reveals the werewolf standing right beside him
During a hallucination, Lawrence looks at the mirror while holding Gwen and sees the reflection of a werewolf
The werewolf suddenly appears from behind Lawrence and lets out a roar. [Video

Lawrence lights a match and looks up to see a dead man hanging in front of him
A dog barks at Lawrence
The werewolf roars as it appears in front of Gwen
The apparently dead werewolf suddenly grabs Gwen’s arm
The witch grabs Caleb around the head, revealing a gnarled claw-like hand
The witch turns around and lets out a cackle
The goat attacks William
As Thomasin reaches down to touch William, Katherine suddenly pulls her away
Dirty water starts pouring into the bath
A bird flies out of the fireplace
The bird flaps again
A man appears behind Arthur
As Arthur looks through a hole in the door, a face appears
Arthur spins a lamp and sees a face inside
Arthur looks up at a building window and sees a face inside
A face comes up behind Arthur as he looks out the window
Arthur touches the window and upon contact is greeted with a screaming lady
Arthur sees something in the mirror
A screaming face appears

The woman in black yells and slides towards Arthur

A sudden sound and movement of something very close
